comments: It's a great course, great to explore new materials. It was also really chill, only 3 projects, not very time consuming (except the day before the critiques). I totally recommend to anyone for a fun elective, or VES studio requirement. I particularly loved learning how to use the woodshop.
This was a great class to explore your artistic voice and to find different materials to do so. I do think this class would be very different with a different teacher - so keep that in mind!
